meanings.definition: A thing added or to be added; an addition.
meanings.sent1: I attached an addendum to my report to include more information.
meanings.sent2: The addendum to the contract clarified the payment terms.
meanings.sent3: The addendum to the recipe suggested adding chocolate chips for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an addendum to the gloomy day, brightening everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's feedback served as an addendum to the student's essay, guiding them towards improvement.

meanings.definition: A section or statement added at the end of a document.
meanings.sent1: The addendum at the end of the book provided a summary of key points.
meanings.sent2: Please review the addendum before signing the agreement.
meanings.sent3: The addendum in the will unexpectedly left the family cat a fortune.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky seemed like an addendum to the beauty of the moon.
meanings.sent5: The addendum in the playbill listed the cast and crew for the audience to see.
